core_files.src/streaming/types.ts: Created streaming interfaces defining request and response streamers with comprehensive metrics tracking
core_files.src/streaming/request-streamer.ts: Implemented zero-buffering request streaming with backpressure support and real-time metrics
core_files.src/streaming/response-streamer.ts: Implemented zero-buffering response streaming with chunk transfer encoding support
core_files.src/streaming/index.ts: Created streaming module exports with unified streaming interface
core_files.src/pool/types.ts: Extended connection pool types to support ReadableStream bodies and streaming responses
core_files.src/pool/ConnectionPool.ts: Updated connection pooling to support streaming requests with streamResponse option
core_files.src/handlers/proxyHandler.ts: Enhanced proxy handler to pass ReadableStream bodies and support streaming responses
core_files.src/proxy.ts: Updated to accept string or ReadableStream bodies with streaming response support
core_files.src/anthropic.ts: Updated to support streaming request bodies and automatic streaming response enablement
core_files.test/streaming.test.ts: Created comprehensive test suite with 25 tests covering all streaming functionality

integration_points: ConnectionPool now supports both string and ReadableStream bodies
proxyHandler maintains backward compatibility with buffered streaming
proxy.ts provides unified interface for streaming requests
anthropic.ts enables streaming automatically for streaming requests

streaming_architecture.zero_buffering: Implemented streaming without buffering entire payloads - memory usage stays constant regardless of payload size
streaming_architecture.backpressure_support: Configurable backpressure thresholds with timeout protection (5s default, 30s max)
streaming_architecture.metrics_tracking: Real-time metrics including totalBytes, chunkCount, avgChunkSize, duration, throughput, backpressureEvents, backpressureTime
streaming_architecture.stream_consumption: Proper stream consumption for accurate metrics collection without memory leaks

error_handling.stream_error_handling: Comprehensive error handling for stream failures, timeouts, and backpressure events
error_handling.fallback_mechanisms: Graceful fallback from streaming to buffered mode when necessary
error_handling.memory_efficiency: Memory usage remains constant regardless of payload size (< 10MB memory for 10MB payload)

performance_optimization.chunked_encoding: Handles chunked transfer encoding for large payloads
performance_optimization.multiplexing_support: Supports both buffered and streaming responses simultaneously
performance_optimization.low_latency: Zero buffering enables true low-latency processing critical for <10ms target

stream_consumption.must_consume_stream: Stream must be fully consumed to avoid memory leaks and accurate metrics
stream_consumption.backpressure_events: Backpressure events must be properly handled to prevent deadlocks
stream_consumption.timeout_handling: Streaming timeouts must be carefully managed to balance performance vs reliability

integration_complexity.type_safety: ReadonlyArray body types are not compatible with ReadableStream requiring proper typing
integration_complexity.stream_response_flag: streamResponse option must be properly propagated through request chain
integration_complexity.model_injection: Streaming bodies require skipModelInjection flag (needs streaming JSON parser for full integration)

testing_coverage.stream_scenarios: Comprehensive testing required for various stream scenarios (empty, single chunk, multi-chunk, large payloads)
testing_coverage.error_cases: Error handling scenarios must be thoroughly tested (network failures, timeouts, backpressure)
testing_coverage.memory_verification: Memory efficiency must be verified across different payload sizes

success_metrics.memory_efficiency: Memory usage constant regardless of payload size
success_metrics.performance_achievement: Zero buffering achieved enabling true low-latency processing
success_metrics.integration_success: Full integration with existing connection pooling and proxy infrastructure

technical_achievements.zero_buffering: Implemented streaming without buffering entire payloads
technical_achievements.chunked_encoding: Proper handling of chunked transfer encoding
technical_achievements.multiplexing: Support for simultaneous buffered and streaming responses

testing_results.payload_sizes: Tested from empty streams to 10MB payloads
testing_results.error_scenarios: All error handling scenarios tested and passing
testing_results.memory_verification: Memory efficiency verified across all test cases

performance_optimization.streaming_json_parser: Integrate streaming JSON parser (subtask 3.3) to enable model injection for streaming bodies
performance_optimization.pipeline_integration: Integrate streaming with PipeliningManager for true HTTP/2 multiplexing
performance_optimization.caching_optimization: Implement response caching for streaming responses where appropriate

monitoring_enhancement.streaming_metrics: Add streaming metrics to production monitoring dashboard
monitoring_enhancement.performance_tracking: Track streaming throughput and latency vs buffered mode
monitoring_enhancement.memory_profiling: Monitor memory usage patterns for different stream scenarios

production_readiness.error_handling: Consider adding circuit breaker pattern for streaming failures
production_readiness.timeout_optimization: Fine-tune default timeouts based on production load testing
production_readiness.graceful_degradation: Implement graceful degradation from streaming to buffered mode on system overload

future_development.streaming_compression: Add support for streaming compression/decompression for large payloads
future_development.streaming_authentication: Enhance authentication to handle streaming request bodies
future_development.streaming_validation: Add request/response validation for streaming scenarios
